sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtrdnmadrzip ( RDMN_CODE , sn , ctprvn_nm , signgu_nm , rdmn , bdnbr_mnnm , bdnbr_slno , buld_nm , detail_buld_nm , zip , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id ) VALUES ( #rdmnCode# , #sn# , #ctprvnNm# , #signguNm# , #rdmn# , #bdnbrMnnm# , #bdnbrSlno# , #buldNm# , #detailBuldNm# , #zip# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #frstRegisterId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtrdnmadrzip SET rdmn_code = #rdmnCode# , sn = #sn# , ctprvn_nm = #ctprvnNm# , signgu_nm = #signguNm# , rdmn = #rdmn# , bdnbr_mnnm = #bdnbrMnnm# , bdnbr_slno = #bdnbrSlno# , buld_nm = #buldNm# , detail_buld_nm = #detailBuldNm# , zip = #zip# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE sn = #sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rdmn_code , sn , ctprvn_nm , signgu_nm , rdmn , bdnbr_mnnm , bdnbr_slno , buld_nm , detail_buld_nm , zip , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtrdnmadrzip WHERE sn = #sn#

SELECT rdmn_code , sn , ctprvn_nm , signgu_nm , rdmn , bdnbr_mnnm , bdnbr_slno , buld_nm , detail_buld_nm , zip , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtrdnmadrzip WHERE 1=1
rdmn_code = #searchKeyword#
sn LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY sn DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtrdnmadrzip WHERE 1=1
rdmn_code = #searchKeyword#
sn LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
